suncertify.db.domain
Class DBMetaInfo

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.db.domain.DBMetaInfo

public final class DBMetaInfo
extends Object

DBMetaInfo contains database meta info (e.g. field names, field sizes, etc.)

Author:
Przemyslaw Bielicki

static int RECORD_LENGTH
          Total overall length in bytes of each record.
static int UNSAVED_RECORD_NO
          No of the record indicating that it is not saved into persistent layer.

FIELD_LENGTHS_MAP

public static final Map<String,Short> FIELD_LENGTHS_MAP
Map containing lengths of fields - field name is the key. If anybody wants to know what is the length of "name" field the only thing to do is to get this info from this map: 
 short nameLength = DBMetaInfo.FIELD_LENGTHS_MAP.get(DBMetaInfo.FIELD_NAME);

public static final int FIRST_RECORD_NO
